tool_description: Uses AI to return medical advice based on the given input
name: Medical Advice API
title: Medical Advice API

api_list.name: Ask a Medical Question
api_list.description: Ask a medical question! Input must be in the form of a question.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://medical-advice-api.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medical-advice-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://medical-advice-api.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medical-advice-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
